casebody.data:
IN RE MGR, Minor. SC: 157821
COA: 338286, 340203 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 16, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of the Academy of Adoption and Assisted Reproduction Attorneys to file a brief amicus curiae is GRANTED. The amicus brief will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before August 6, 2018.
